pageTitle: News gathering Santa letters, holiday recipes | PerryCountyNews.com
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {24838=Perry County News | circulation@perrycountynews.com | 812-547-3424 P.O. Box 309, 537 Main Street, Tell City, IN 47586 Office Hours are 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., Monday through Friday, 19302=TELL CITY - Now that Halloween has passed, The News staff has again been asked to gather letters to Santa Claus. Good boys and girls can send their letters for publication in our annual Holiday Greetings section, to be published Dec. 20 - just in time for Santa to read them., 33078=Copyright © 2015}
